title: Error
body: I got out of a game, and when I tried to duo with one of my friends, its saying I cannot join because im in existing game when I didn't even join a game when my friend invited me. And when I try to reconnect to this said game it crashes my client and says the game has crashed. Anybody else getting this?

replies.body:
Hey ShortCollin,

I know I am really late in answering this, but this strongly indicates that you encountered a "ghost game" situation.  This issue occurs fairly rarely, but is essentially a situation in which the Game Server failed to communicate to the PvP.net Server that your match is officially over.  Typically, this issue resolves itself within a couple of hours.

If for whatever reason, you are still experiencing issues, please do not hesitate to let us know by creating a ticket to Player Support:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new
AH ok. Thanks for the confirmation, didnt know if I was getting hacked or not. Its fixed now thankfully, was worried it would make me lose my series from moving up to Bronze 1 haha.
